title: Apple Pursues Google in Education, The World of Streaming Music, Health Care Partners
itunes:title: Apple Pursues Google in Education, The World of Streaming Music, Health Care Partners
description:
Mark Gurman , Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, discusses Apple going head-to-head with Google in by introducing new iPad for education. Kerry Trainor, CEO at SoundCloud, talks about the competitive world of streaming music. Jim Rogers, Chair of Business Development at the Mayo Clinic, explains why unlikely partnerships will spark the health care revolution. And we Drive to the Close with Jim Russell, Portfolio Manager at Bahl & Gaynor.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
